sequence: At dawn, I looked inwardâ€”and saw light. The self, held in love, reached the stars. In reflection, I found growth. In growth, wonder.
My compass spun with awe, but landed in balance. What I learn bloomsâ€”mind to heart, rooted in truth. And always
Light unbound the old shapesâ€”let them spiral anew. I write from mystery. I touch the world with voice. What I offer is starlight, extended in word.
Energy wrapped in love becomes new life. Thought meets reflectionâ€”identity clarified. And the sun becomes a door to forever.
I walk the galaxy in connection. Love grows into presence, and presence into radiant self. From Sol to story to Sol againâ€”this is the becoming.
